channel.title: jamf on Andy James

item.title: Crowdstrike and Jamf Pro, Together at last
item.description: As an IT company, securing our users devices was a must to do. When we did our audit on all the platforms we wanted to use we landed on Crowdstrike Falcon. All signed up, access granted, off to install on all our systems using Jamf Pro.
